Job Title: Inside Sales Customer Service

Location: Denver, CO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Our team is rapidly expanding, and we’re searching for a driven inside sales representative! You’ll convert pre-qualified leads and turn former customers into repeat business. As a customer-facing sales rep, you'll have the opportunity to work side-by-side with the contractors and suppliers that build our state's infrastructure. Inside sales reps at Copeland will acquire expertise in the underground utilities sector of the construction industry. Our inside sales teammates are the face of our business, and they play a primary role in our tried-and-true recipe for success "We succeed because our customers succeed."

Compensation

$52,000

Responsibilities

Build customer relationships with existing clients by reaching out via phone calls, emails, or other forms of communication to increase the likelihood of them using our services againMaintain the customer database with updated information on past, current, and potential clients Handle sales inquiries from pre-qualified leads and make sure client needs are taken care ofManage sales for both walk-in customers and telephone inquiriesFulfill basic quote requests and send out standard submittal packsCoordinate with teammates to advance orders through the Copeland order flow, whether at the quote, design drawings, production, or transportation stage

Qualifications

Possess superb customer service skills, listening skills, presentation skills, and communication skillsHigh school diploma or GED required, college experience is highly valuedAbility to continually learn and retain new informationFamiliarity with Civil plans and/or construction industry experience preferredPositive, problem-solving attitude

About Company

Copeland Precast prides itself on providing outstanding service and quality precast concrete. We have over 85 years of experience manufacturing and providing precast concrete throughout the state of Colorado, and through all that time our recipe for success has remained unchanged we succeed because our customers succeed. Come be part of a fast-growing company and a team of proven winners, dedicated to providing the very best in service.

At Copeland, We

Have integrity and honesty in all that we doAre team playersAre committed to excellenceAre dedicated to serving our customersHave fun

1

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
